case.title: American girl for British guy - 25 (Philadelphia)
case.text: I am looking for a guy who will sweep me off my feet. Make me fall in love with his charm and wit. Someone who can show their love and affection. I am a simple American girl, living in the Philadelphia area. I am very affectionate, but I don't give anything away right away (if you know what I mean.) I want something serious that will last for a good long while. To be honest, I don't know how this would work. But I wanted something totally different and thought this would be. Or even if you are a British man moving to America or are in my area of the world already. Send me a email. Please be sweet, cute (don't have to be a model but still attractive), under 35 years. Please,if this interests you, reply with a email.
